title: The Qolsys IQ WiFi 6 from Johnson Controls
text: The latest generation mesh Wi-Fi router the Qolsys IQ WiFi 6 from Johnson Controls was purpose built to improve installation and maintenance efficiencies for Dealers.

title: i-PRO Multi-directional and PTZ Combo camera
text: i-PRO has turned the surveillance camera industry upside down with the release of the Multi-directional and PTZ Camera with Ai engine.

title: Introducing the New i-PRO Configuration Tool
text: In this article, we are going to take a quick look at the configuration tool released by i-PRO to support major VSM solutions.

title: Leading edge technology - the Halo 3C
text: How many times have you quoted a job and had customers question how they set up camera’s in a space that will potentially infringe on someone’s privacy rights? Halo 3C is the answer.

title: Latest Products from Dell
text: As a Dell Partner, you can trust that when you are buying Dell products from us, that you are buying genuine parts. Let’s take a look at a couple of products in our Dell range that shine in the catalogue.

title: Avigilon - H5A Multi-Sensor Camera
text: In this article, we’d like to introduce you to the Avigilon H5A Multisensor camera. It boasts 360-degree panoramic views with faster frame rates delivering high-quality images in even the most challenging of lighting situations.
